name: Sanatorium (Occular Malice)
description:
Explore the horror and mystery of a totally unique, not asset flipped (but totally asset flipped) abandoned hospital and discover the secret hidden within.

Sanatorium was made in 12 hours for the Shitty Horror Game Jam and is intentionally bad. Is it bad or is it awful? You decide.

You are locked inside the abandoned Karlheinz Asylum and must discover what lies within. Search for keys to keep moving forward. Collect the 8 notes to discover the secret of the Sanatorium!

Controls

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse to look
  • E to open doors and pick up items
  • Q to examine items
  • TAB for inventory

Engine

  • Unity 2021.3.9f1

Assets

  • Horror FPS Kit - ThunderWire Studio
  • Abandoned Asylum - Lukas Bobor
